translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……ん、んんんん…………無理。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Nn, nnnnn... impossible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ、相当複雑な処理で操作してるみたい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems to be operated by a considerably complex process..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「操作するだけなのに、ですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though it's just about operating it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういうの、普通は扱いやすく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Usually, things like that are made user-friendly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 簡単にしそうな気がするんですけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and simpler to handle... or so I would think."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たぶん……パイアールの『簡単』の基準って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Probably... the standard of 'easy' for Paiar

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私たちとはかけ離れてるのよ。悔しいけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is completely different from ours. It's frustrating, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「破壊しましょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's destroy it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どのみち、何台かは完成してるもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyway, there are already a few completed units."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「動かない物を壊すだけでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even just breaking something that doesn't move,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とんでもなく大変ですけどね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is incredibly difficult though..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「内部の制御系を叩くなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we hit the internal control system,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 比較的楽……かなぁ、たぶん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it might be comparatively easier... I guess..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、やむをえん。さっさと済ませるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, it can't be helped. Let's get it done quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいビリビリ野郎。しっかり働けよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, you crackling guy. Work properly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「チッ。あの野郎のねぐらを荒らすたぁ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch. To raid that bastard's nest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せこい事やらされるもんだぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they make us do petty stuff like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「四の五のほざくな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Stop whining about this and that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっさとやれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just do it quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へいへい、っと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, alright."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁ――バラバラにしてやるか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then—let's tear it apart!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂いやーん！　刃こぼれするー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't want to! The blade's gonna chip!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その辺の釘バットとかで壊せばいいじゃない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why don't you just break it with some nearby spiked bat or something!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やかましいわ！　力一杯叩きつけてくれる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up! I'll smash it with all my strength!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 切れ味下げるんじゃないぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't dull my blade though!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わひー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wahi!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくの間、工場内は金属音と破壊音、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For a while, the factory echoed with the sounds of metal and destruction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてカオスの悲鳴が響き続けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the continued screams of Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぜい、ぜい……終わった、か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huff, huff... it's over, huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスたちは、最後の一台をようやく破壊した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others finally destroyed the last unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、後半はシーザーさんとかが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I feel like Caesar-san and the others

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんど働いてた気が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were the ones doing most of the work in the second half..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご苦労、シーザー。もういいぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good work, Caesar. You can stop now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シーザー、頑張ッタ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Caesar, you did your best."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手持ちの武器では刃こぼれするために
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because the blades on their weapons chipped off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 途中から使っていた戦車パーツの破片を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the fragments of tank parts they had been using midway,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーザーは言われて手放した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caesar gave up when told to.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわ……ひどいなぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... this is terrible..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんで入って来れたんだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder how they got in."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 静寂を取り戻した工場内に、小さな足音が響く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the factory, now returned to silence, small footsteps echoed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……そっか。しまったな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... I see. Damn, I forgot to activate

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迎撃システムを稼働させてなかったや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the interception system."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パイアール！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Paiar!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？　レイ。ああ、寝返ったんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Rei. Ah, you've defected."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 助けなくてもいいよね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So I don't have to help you, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おぉ。ま、色々あってな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh. Well, a lot happened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏切りだのなんだの、喚く様な関係でもねェだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This isn't exactly a relationship where you scream about betrayal and stuff."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいよ、別に。死んでもいいよね？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fine, whatever. You don't mind if I die, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂は実験にでも使わせてもらうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll let you use the Demon Blood Soul for experiments or whatever."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Nn, nnnnn... impossible."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ、相当複雑な処理で操作してるみたい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It seems to be operated by a considerably complex process..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「操作するだけなのに、ですか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even though it's just about operating it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういうの、普通は扱いやすく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Usually, things like that are made user-friendly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 簡単にしそうな気がするんですけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and simpler to handle... or so I would think."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たぶん……パイアールの『簡単』の基準って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Probably... the standard of 'easy' for Paiar

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私たちとはかけ離れてるのよ。悔しいけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is completely different from ours. It's frustrating, but..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「破壊しましょ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's destroy it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どのみち、何台かは完成してるもの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Anyway, there are already a few completed units."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even just breaking something that doesn't move,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とんでもなく大変ですけどね……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we hit the internal control system,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it might be comparatively easier... I guess..."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, it can't be helped. Let's get it done quickly."

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, you crackling guy. Work properly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「チッ。あの野郎のねぐらを荒らすたぁ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch. To raid that bastard's nest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せこい事やらされるもんだぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they make us do petty stuff like this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「四の五のほざくな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Stop whining about this and that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっさとやれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just do it quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へいへい、っと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, alright."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さぁ――バラバラにしてやるか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then—let's tear it apart!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂いやーん！　刃こぼれするー！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't want to! The blade's gonna chip!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その辺の釘バットとかで壊せばいいじゃない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why don't you just break it with some nearby spiked bat or something!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やかましいわ！　力一杯叩きつけてくれる！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up! I'll smash it with all my strength!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 切れ味下げるんじゃないぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't dull my blade though!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わひー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wahi!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくの間、工場内は金属音と破壊音、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For a while, the factory echoed with the sounds of metal and destruction,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてカオスの悲鳴が響き続けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the continued screams of Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぜい、ぜい……終わった、か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huff, huff... it's over, huh..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスたちは、最後の一台をようやく破壊した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others finally destroyed the last unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、後半はシーザーさんとかが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-I feel like Caesar-san and the others

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんど働いてた気が……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were the ones doing most of the work in the second half..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご苦労、シーザー。もういいぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Good work, Caesar. You can stop now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「シーザー、頑張ッタ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Caesar, you did your best."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手持ちの武器では刃こぼれするために
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because the blades on their weapons chipped off,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 途中から使っていた戦車パーツの破片を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the fragments of tank parts they had been using midway,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーザーは言われて手放した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caesar gave up when told to.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわ……ひどいなぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... this is terrible..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんで入って来れたんだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wonder how they got in."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 静寂を取り戻した工場内に、小さな足音が響く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the factory, now returned to silence, small footsteps echoed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ……そっか。しまったな、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... I see. Damn, I forgot to activate

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迎撃システムを稼働させてなかったや」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the interception system."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パイアール！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Paiar!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？　レイ。ああ、寝返ったんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Rei. Ah, you've defected."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 助けなくてもいいよね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So I don't have to help you, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おぉ。ま、色々あってな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh. Well, a lot happened.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏切りだのなんだの、喚く様な関係でもねェだろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This isn't exactly a relationship where you scream about betrayal and stuff."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいよ、別に。死んでもいいよね？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fine, whatever. You don't mind if I die, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔血魂は実験にでも使わせてもらうよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll let you use the Demon Blood Soul for experiments or whatever."
